Package LMS.entities

Class Delivery

  • Object
    • LMS.entities.Delivery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Delivery>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InterationalDelivery, RegionalDelivery
    public abstract class Delivery
extends Object
implements Comparable<Delivery>
    A delivery within the Logistics Management System.

    A delivery collects goods at a certain time and place and after transport delivers them at another time and place. A delivery is transported by a specific carrier and identified by a unique id.

    The usual life cycle is
    • create a delivery with id, pick up and drop off location
    • add goods
    • assign a carrier
    • collect
    • deliver

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

      The carrier assigned to this delivery.
      private DateTime collected
      The date and time when this delivery is collected from the sender.

      The date and time when this delivery is delivered to the recipient.
      private String from
      The pick up location where the goods of this delivery are sent from.
      private java.util.Set<Item> goods
      The set of goods this delivery transports.
      private long id
      Unique id of this delivery.
      private String to
      The drop off location where the goods of this delivery are sent to.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Delivery​(long id, String from, String to)
      Constructs a delivery with specified id, pickup and drop off location.
      The id must be greater than 0 and the String arguments must be non-null and non-empty.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addGoods​(Iterable<Item> items)
      Adds shipping items to this delivery.
      Shipping items can only be added if this delivery has not been assigned a carrier and has not been collected and not been delivered yet.

      Only those shipping items that are not yet added to this delivery are added, the rest are ignored.

      Assigns a carrier to this delivery.
      Only non-null carriers that can handle the total mass of this delivery (i.e.
      boolean collect​(DateTime toc)
      Collects this delivery from pick up location at a specified date and time.
      A delivery can only be collected if it has not been collected so far, has a proper carrier assigned and at least one shipping item added.
      If it can be collected, the specified date and time is stored in a private copy in this delivery.
      int compareTo​(Delivery arg0)
      Implements natural ordering by id for deliveries.
      boolean deliver​(DateTime tod)
      Delivers this delivery to drop off location at a specified date and time.
      A delivery can only be delivered if it has been previously collected and not yet been delivered.

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private long id
        Unique id of this delivery.

      • from

        private String from
        The pick up location where the goods of this delivery are sent from.

      • to

        private String to
        The drop off location where the goods of this delivery are sent to.

      • collected

        private DateTime collected
        The date and time when this delivery is collected from the sender. A null value means this delivery has not been collected yet.

      • delivered

        private DateTime delivered
        The date and time when this delivery is delivered to the recipient. A null value means this delivery has not been delivered yet.

      • carrier

        private Vehicle carrier
        The carrier assigned to this delivery. A null value means no carrier has been assigned yet.

      • goods

        private java.util.Set<Item> goods
        The set of goods this delivery transports.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Delivery

        public Delivery​(long id,
                String from,
                String to)
        Constructs a delivery with specified id, pickup and drop off location.
        The id must be greater than 0 and the String arguments must be non-null and non-empty. When invalid arguments are passed an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        id - the id to set
        from - the pick up location to set
        to - the drop off location to set
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when invalid arguments are passed
        Hint:
        use ensureNonNullNonEmpty(java.lang.String)

    • Method Detail

      • getTotal

        public abstract int getTotal()
        Calculates the total amount (of money) to be collected at the drop off location in Euro cents.
        To be implemented in concrete subclasses.
        Returns:
        the total amount of money to be collected at the drop off location in Euro cents.

      • totalMass

        protected final float totalMass()
        Calculates the total mass of this delivery in kg.
        Returns:
        the total (combined) mass of all shipping items in this delivery or -1, if this delivery contains no shipping items.

      • isCollected

        public boolean isCollected()
        Status indicating whether the goods of this delivery have been handed to the delivery service provider. True if the goods have been picked up, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the goods of this delivery have been collected, false otherwise.

      • isDelivered

        public boolean isDelivered()
        Status indicating whether the goods of this delivery have been delivered to the destination by the delivery service provider. True if delivered, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the goods of this delivery have been delivered, false otherwise.

      • isAssigned

        private boolean isAssigned()
        Status indicating whether a carrier has been assigned to this delivery.
        Returns:
        true if a carrier has been assigned, false otherwise.

      • addGoods

        public final boolean addGoods​(Item item)
        Adds a shipping item to this delivery.
        A shipping item can only be added if this delivery has not been assigned a carrier and not been collected and not been delivered yet.
        Parameters:
        item - the shipping item to add to this delivery
        Returns:
        if the shipping item could be successfully added to this delivery false otherwise

      • addGoods

        public final boolean addGoods​(Iterable<Item> items)
        Adds shipping items to this delivery.
        Shipping items can only be added if this delivery has not been assigned a carrier and has not been collected and not been delivered yet.

        Only those shipping items that are not yet added to this delivery are added, the rest are ignored.

        Parameters:
        items - the shipping items to add to this delivery
        Returns:
        true if any shipping item could be successfully added to this delivery

      • getGoods

        public java.util.Set<Item> getGoods()
        Gets the shipping items of this delivery.
        The returned set is a copy of the private set held by this object. The shipping items in the set, however are not copied.
        Returns:
        the shipping items of this delivery

      • assignCarrier

        public final void assignCarrier​(Vehicle v)
        Assigns a carrier to this delivery.
        Only non-null carriers that can handle the total mass of this delivery (i.e. whose maximum load capacity is greater than or equal) are assigned.
        Parameters:
        v - the carrier to set

      • collect

        public final boolean collect​(DateTime toc)
        Collects this delivery from pick up location at a specified date and time.
        A delivery can only be collected if it has not been collected so far, has a proper carrier assigned and at least one shipping item added.
        If it can be collected, the specified date and time is stored in a private copy in this delivery.
        Parameters:
        toc - the date and time of collection
        Returns:
        true if this delivery has was successfully collected, false otherwise

      • deliver

        public final boolean deliver​(DateTime tod)
        Delivers this delivery to drop off location at a specified date and time.
        A delivery can only be delivered if it has been previously collected and not yet been delivered.
        If it can be delivered, the specified date and time is stored in a private copy in this delivery.
        Parameters:
        tod - the date and time of delivery
        Returns:
        true if this delivery was successfully delivered, false otherwise

      • ensureNonNullNonEmpty

        private final String ensureNonNullNonEmpty​(String str)
        Ensures that a string is non null and non empty.
        Returns the argument if it is non-null and non-empty, throws an IllegalArgumentException otherwise.
        Parameters:
        str - the string whose non-nullity and non-emptiness is to be ensured
        Returns:
        the argument if it is non-null and non-empty
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is null or empty
        Hint:
        use this method in the constructor(s)
